definition: earth/dust/clay/local/indigenous/crude opium/unsophisticated/one of the eight categories of ancient musical instruments 八音[ba1 yin1]

sentences.english: Refuse the pursuit of all opposite sexes, is it waited quietly so far for someone that the private school wonder?
sentences.chinese: 拒绝一切异性的追求，塾不知是为谁而静等至今？

sentences.english: Mr Noda is the first Matsushita alumnus to lead Japan.
sentences.chinese: 野田佳彦是松下政经塾第一位执掌日本的校友。

definition: to have children/to raise or bring up/to educate
to bank up with earth/to cultivate (lit. or fig.)/to train (people)
to serve as an official/an official/the two chess pieces in Chinese chess guarding the "general" or "king" 將|将[jiang4]

(main) hall/large room for a specific purpose/CL:間|间[jian1]/relationship between cousins etc on the paternal side of a family/of the same clan/classifier for classes, lectures etc/classifier for sets of furniture
Imperial scholar from the Ming Dynasty onwards
worthy or virtuous person/honorific used for a person of the same or a younger generation
